info.name: video-formatter
info.description: A tool for resizing and sampling videos

inputs.name: raw-video
inputs.description: The raw input video to process

outputs.name: sampled-frames
outputs.description: A directory containing the sampled frames

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The output [width, height] of the sampled frames

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: A scaling factor to apply to the sampled frames

parameters.name: fps
parameters.description: The sampling rate to use when sampling the video frames
